casebody.data:
In the Matter of Julius HARRIS, Bankrupt, Appellant. No. 106. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Dec. 11, 1931. Nathan Heller, of Flushing, N. Y. (Harry L. Seholer, of Jamaica, N. Y., of counsel), for appellant. Chester E. Frankel, of New York City, for appellee.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed in open court.
